column2: You meet another Mech Suit pilot on the battlefield. You notice they are moving towards you to engage...
May fortune be on my side

It was a close battle, but your opponent has bested you in combat. Your allies manage to rescue you and tow your Mech Suit before the enemy could finish you off, but you'll need time to heal after a fight like this.
With great skill and tact, you and your Mech Suit managed to defeat your opponent. Unfortunately, they retreated before you could finish them off.
